sourcesContent:
import {initializeApp} from 'firebase/app'
import { getFirestore } from "firebase/firestore"

const fireEnvironment = {
  production: true ,
  apiKey: "AIzaSyBmdv-xCECoX2iYG25odG1XZAR7Xqg7mmE",
  authDomain: "newmyproject-fb602.firebaseapp.com",
  projectId: "newmyproject-fb602",
  storageBucket: "newmyproject-fb602.appspot.com",
  messagingSenderId: "171907119308",
  appId: "1:171907119308:web:f1a14ca67d7279cd3f2a69",
  measurementId: "G-G5ZY8P7TV2"
}

const firebaseApp = initializeApp(fireEnvironment)  //1차 정보 접근
const firebase = getFirestore(firebaseApp)  //정보가 올바르면 아래 파이어스토어 접근

export default firebase
